item.title: Nfs
item.author: MengDemao
item.description: nfs服务 安装 1sudo apt-get install nfs-kernel-server 设置导出 1/home/exports *(rw,nohide,insecure,no_subtree_check,async,no_root_squash) 开启服务 1sudo /etc/init.d/nfs-kernel-server restart 测试 1sudo mount -t nfs -o nolock,vers=3 127.0.0.1:/home/exports /mnt 2ls /mnt
